translation.en: You know how I came up with the idea for the Triple-X program?
Skateboards and swimming pools.
Skateboards used to be stuck on the ground.
Adolescent transportation. Then 1977 happens.
translation.ko: 스케이트보드는 애들이 땅에서 타는 거였지 근데 1977년

translation.en: Big drought hits Southern California.
Got so bad, rich suburbanites couldn't afford to fill their swimming pools.
translation.ko: 부자들도 집 수영장에 물을 못 채웠어

translation.en: That's when the light clicked on.
translation.ko: 그때 누가 기발한 아이디어를 낸 거지

translation.en: Some kid figured out he could skate those empty pools
translation.ko: 한 꼬맹이가 빈 수영장에서 스케이트보드를 타면 되겠다 생각한 거야

translation.en: and get some real nasty air.
translation.ko: 빈 수영장에서 스케이트보드를 타면 되겠다 생각한 거야

translation.en: Dogtown and Z-Boys. You ever seen it? It's a movie.
No? Doesn't matter.
Anyhow, our hero starts doing things on a board
translation.ko: 됐고, 아무튼 그 꼬맹이가 스케이트보드 타고

translation.en: that no one's ever seen before.
Things the world thought were impossible.
Now, that kid needed that drought.
The world needed those empty pools.
translation.ko: 이 세상은 텅 빈 수영장이 필요했지

translation.en: That's why Triple-X.
Do you feel safer today than you felt yesterday?
translation.ko: 세상이 어제보다 오늘 더 안전해졌다고 생각해?

translation.en: I know I don't.
The biggest, most expensive military in the world,
translation.ko: 우린 최대 자본을 부은 최강의 군대를 가졌으면서도

translation.en: and we're still scared of shoe and tighty-whitey bombs at the airport.
translation.ko: 공항에선 신발이나 폭탄 때문에 벌벌 떨어

translation.en: Why is that?
Because soldiers are built to take orders and fight wars.
But we, my friend, are not at war.
We are at peril.
That's why Triple-X.
What's the matter? You on a diet? You ain't hungry?
[speaking Portuguese] It's seven-thirty in the morning.
So? It's lunch or dinnertime somewhere in the world. Come on, eat up!
You know who does feel safe? The men in charge. The world beaters.
The top-shelf, par excellence ayatollahs with all the "dollahs."
And that's because those righteous bastards, somewhere along the way, made a deal with the devil.
translation.ko: 그 잘난 양반들은 살다 보면 결국 악마와 거래해

translation.en: They traded liberty for safety.
And us, we the people, ended up losing both.
translation.ko: 우리 서민들은 둘 다 잃었으니 트리플 엑스가 필요하지

translation.en: That's why Triple-X.
translation.ko: 둘 다 잃었으니 트리플 엑스가 필요하지

translation.en: While everybody else is stuck on the ground,
we're doing shit on the board, nobody's ever even seen before.
[sighs] Well, that's my pitch.
I always was a better spy than a salesman.
So, what do you say?
[speaking Portuguese] I'm no hero. I'm just a footballer.
My bad.
So, I'll leave you be, then. [scoffs]
Who said there's no such thing as a free meal?
-Down on the ground, now! -[gun cocks]
Give me the money!
Don't move! Hurry up!
Goal!
And you say you're no hero.
I got to call bullshit on that!
You're exactly the kind of hero the world needs.
At the end of the day, it comes down to the same question I've been asking my wife
every Friday night for the last 20 years.
Do you want some of this? Or are you just gonna...
-[automated voice] Access granted. -[elevator dings]
[Marke] Okay, you may sit.
Gentlemen,
this is the device that crashed the satellite and killed Gibbons.
translation.ko: 이게 위성을 추락시켜 기븐스를 죽인 장치예요

translation.en: Nerds in the lab have coined it "Pandora's Box."
My team backtracked the satellite's last signal input to Miami.
translation.ko: 우리 팀이 마지막 신호를 추적하니 마이애미가 나왔어요

translation.en: Some asshole living the high life at the Ritz-Carlton penthouse
thought he could hold the world ransom.
Three flashbangs, two bullets,
translation.ko: 수류탄 세 개 쓰고 총 두 방 날려 그놈을 사살한 뒤

translation.en: and one body bag later, we took custody of the device.
translation.ko: 수류탄 세 개 쓰고 총 두 방 날려 그놈을 사살한 뒤 입수했어요

translation.en: We must have over 100 redundancies in place
to prevent some punk with a laptop from hijacking satellites.
translation.ko: 어중이떠중이가 위성을 탈취할 수는 없을 텐데요

translation.en: And Pandora's Box can bypass all of them.
With the push of a button, it can eavesdrop on secure communications,
corrupt military software, transmit false intelligence,
translation.ko: 군 프로그램 오염시키고 거짓 정보를 송출하고

translation.en: or crash a satellite out of the sky like a goddamn tactical warhead.
One of you is behind this.
And I am not leaving here until I find out who.
translation.ko: 그게 누구인지 알기 전까지 여기서 안 나가요

translation.en: You fight me with a book?
Here you go, brother. Chapter one! Page one!
Shit happens.
You're late!
-Just in time, boss. -[tires screeching]
[MI6 Control] They bust in here, step on our throats,
and take the one device that can cause a global power shift.
translation.ko: 전 세계 권력 지형을 뒤바꿀 장치를 가져갔는데

translation.en: So how do we get it back?
These assholes just took out the best of the best like it was Sunday brunch.
We need someone who can move like them, fight like them.
We need someone who can walk into a tornado,
and come out the other side like it was a damn gentle breeze.
translation.ko: 산들바람 맞은 듯 가볍게 나올 사람이 필요해요

translation.en: You know someone like that?
No.
But Gibbons did.
-What you doing? -That's loco, chico!
Xander!
-[man] Xander! -[laughs]
[speaking Spanish] Hey, friend.
[speaking Spanish] Give me a second.
-Gracias, amigo. -[laughs]
[sports announcer] And here we go, we are underway!
[speaking Spanish] I knew you would do it, Xander. You brought the world to us.
The world is big, but always fits in your heart.
translation.ko: 세상이 아무리 커도 얼마든지 네 마음에 담을 수 있단다

translation.en: Take it with you always.
Go, go, go.
[Lola] Of course, Xander Cage can't pay the satellite company,
just like a regular guy. [chuckles]
What?
And line the pockets of some boardroom billionaires?
You know,
these days, a regular guy can't afford to be regular.
-[grunts] -Let's go.
[man] World getting smaller?
I know the feeling.
Running from your problems never works out.
You need a new plan.
-I need a new map. -[laughs]
Don't say I didn't warn you.
Oh, boy.
Here we go again.
Down! Get down! Don't move, asshole!
On your knees now, you son of a bitch!
Okay, okay. I want to comply. I really wanna comply. But you're confusing me.
translation.ko: 시키는 대로 하고 싶지만 헷갈려서 말이야

translation.en: "Don't move, you asshole. On your knees, you son of a bitch." Which is it?
translation.ko: 꼼짝 말라고 해놓고 어떻게 꿇으란 거야?

translation.en: -You have three seconds to comply! -You're not good at this.
-One! -[sighs]
Two!
Okay!
Come on out, Frankenstein!
Gibbons!
-Gibbons? -Olly-olly-oxen-free.
Wow. You really do look different, Gibbons.
Did you lose weight?
Augustus always had such, well,
not exactly nice things to say about you.
When did you realize it was all fake?
You mean the clown show?
You had a guy over there wearing $1,000 Beats
when you can buy the knockoff for half the price.
Or the lady that was running to catch a bus that doesn't leave for two hours.
translation.ko: 여자는 두 시간 후에 떠나는 버스를 헐레벌떡 탔고

translation.en: Or the security guard over there buying a soda with foreign currency?
translation.ko: 저 경비원은 외국 돈으로 음료수 샀어

translation.en: Oh, you know what the kicker was?
Clarence from It's a Wonderful Life.
The nice old man that you had sit down next to me with the bag of bombs?
translation.ko: 폭탄 든 가방을 들고 옆에 앉아선

translation.en: Just happened to know I spoke English.
translation.ko: 내가 영어 하는 걸 이미 알고 있더군

translation.en: Go figure.
-The bullets could've been real. -Then the body armor would've been real.
I don't know you, but... I don't like to be tested.
Gibbons never believed you were dead! Never stopped looking for you.
translation.ko: 기븐스는 당신이 죽었다고 믿지 않았어 계속 찾았지

translation.en: -Hell of a friend. -Yeah, well, the joke's on him.
translation.ko: - 엄청 친했나 봐 - 기븐스만 우습게 된 거지

translation.en: -'Cause we were never friends. -Oh, trust me, he's not laughing.
translation.ko: - 우린 친구가 아니었거든 - 아니, 기븐스는 못 웃어

translation.en: Nor will he ever again, for that matter.
[Marke] I've never seen anything like it.
This group is lethal, and they don't care who or what gets in their way.
I was hoping you'd be interested in headlining the next fight card.
translation.ko: 다음 작전을 진행할 팀을 맡아줬으면 해

translation.en: [Xander] Seventy feet across, 90 feet down.
Three inches of security glass?
No rope. No line. No chute.
I bet they had a blast.
We ran facial IDs on every database in the world.
translation.ko: 놈들 얼굴 검색했는데 아무것도 안 떠

translation.en: Nothing. Not even a match on a speeding ticket.
translation.ko: 놈들 얼굴 검색했는데 아무것도 안 떠 과속 딱지조차 끊은 적 없어

translation.en: They're ghosts, in a day and age where that kind of thing is almost impossible.
translation.ko: 유령 같은 놈들이야 요즘 세상에선 불가능한 일인데

translation.en: Okay,
you get that I don't work for suits.
What makes you think I'm gonna want to ruin all their fun?
Well, if you won't do it for me,
do it for Gibbons.
Your country needs you, Mr. Cage. The Triple-X program needs you.
translation.ko: 케이지, 조국은 널 필요로 해 트리플 엑스도 마찬가지야

translation.en: It's time to be a patriot.
By whose definition?
The last time I was patriotic, I got three strikes.
And there was only one man who believed in the underdog.
Patriotism is dead.
translation.ko: 애국자 따윈 이제 없어 반군과 폭군뿐이지

translation.en: -There's only rebels and tyrants now. -So, which are you?
translation.ko: 애국자 따윈 이제 없어 반군과 폭군뿐이지 당신은 어느 쪽이지?

translation.en: I'm Triple-X.
Well, welcome back, Triple-X.
Uh, where are you going?
-London. -Why? What's in London?
A ghost hunter.
And possibly, my fur coat.
I'd forgotten how beautiful the view is up here.
translation.ko: 여기 풍경이 이렇게 예쁜 걸 잊고 있었네

translation.en: Oh, I, uh, see you found your coat.
Well, you promised to take care of it for me.
And I did.
So, I'm looking for someone.
Since when have we had a business relationship?
I get caught even touching a computer, my ass goes away for 20.
[Xander] Name your price. You know I'm good for it.
Information like this doesn't have a price.
[Xander] Ainsley, everything has a price.
Now, if you don't think you can pull it off,
if you lost your edge, just tell me and I'll understand.
-You wanna know what it is, Cage? -What?
I used to think you were the man.
But now, I don't know, maybe I feel like you're just working for him.
Come on.
Nobody knows I'm here.
And you know how I am about keeping secrets.
So you say, but Interpol's got these new listening bugs.
They're practically invisible. Real MI6 kind of shit.
translation.ko: 눈에 안 보이는 MI6가 쓰는 그런 거

translation.en: Disappear on your skin, under your arms,
tied around your balls like a Christmas bow.
Unwrap me, then.
You know, studies have proven that sexual consummation
irrevocably ruins nine out of 10 relationships.
translation.ko: 그거 알아? 몸을 섞은 사이는 십중팔구 깨진대

translation.en: Lucky for me, you love to gamble.
Of course...
...not.
My friends, on the other hand, adore stiff odds.
translation.ko: 하지만 내 친구들은 딱딱한 거라면 미쳐

translation.en: Stiff odds?
The things I do for my country.
Like finding needles in a stack of needles.
Even though you're shackled by the Queen,
you're still the best in the world.
Thank you.
Do yourself a favor. Burn this.
The whispers I hear, these ghosts of yours are the real kind of trouble.
They've got training, they've got funding, and they've got no problem
translation.ko: 철저히 훈련받고 자금도 넘치는 데다 여차하면 다 없애버린대

translation.en: running over anyone who gets in their way.
Okay, so, you're worried that I might get hurt?
I'm worried you might get dead.
You know, I'm touched that you can imagine a world without me in it.
translation.ko: 나 없는 세상이 상상되다니 참 감동이야

translation.en: It'll be a little less fun.
That's all I'm saying.
Your ghosts are hanging out in the Philippines.
Figures they'd go to the Pacific.
Some jungle rave that's off the grid.
How the hell did you find it so quickly?
Undercover work.
Where is it? What did you do with Pandora's Box?
It's in a safe place.
That wasn't a part of the plan.
After all these years, you're still shocked when I improvise?
translation.ko: 나를 안 세월이 얼마인데 내가 계획을 안 따라서 놀랐어?

translation.en: No. But the mission was to destroy it.
Turns out there's a new mission.
I'm not gonna destroy the one thing I can use to get what we want.
translation.ko: 그거면 우리가 원하는 걸 얻을 수 있어

translation.en: -The whole world is looking for us, Xiang. -Let them come!
translation.ko: - 전부 몰려올 거야, 시앙 - 오라고 해!

translation.en: You worry about pawn sacrifice.
I got my eye on the king.
That's the problem.
You forgot the queen.
[Marke] After your success taking down Anarchy 99,
translation.ko: "공군 기지 영국 레이큰히스" 당신이 '아나키99'를 일망타진한 후

translation.en: Gibbons was handed a blank check.
Which is the long way of saying
he got you a new ride.
World went and got an upgrade since you died, Cage.
translation.ko: 네가 죽고 난 후로 세상이 업그레이드됐거든

translation.en: Onboard drones, anti-air countermeasures,
and fuel tanks big enough
translation.ko: 연료 탱크는 착륙 한 번 없이

translation.en: to circumnavigate the globe three times without ever landing.
translation.ko: 연료 탱크는 착륙 한 번 없이 지구를 세 바퀴 돌 정도로 거대하지

translation.en: You can check your coat. I promise you, no one would dare steal it.
translation.ko: 코트 맡겨도 돼, 훔칠 사람 없어

translation.en: I can't guarantee it won't walk off on its own.
Wheels up in 10, boys! Which means you're already seven minutes behind.
Is she always this much fun, or just on special occasions?
translation.ko: 원래 저렇게 재밌는 여자야? 아니면 오늘만 그런 거야?

translation.en: No wonder our country's in debt trillions of dollars.
Do you really need all these gadgets to get the bad guys?
translation.ko: 악당들 잡는 데 이것들이 다 필요해?

translation.en: Oh, we don't need any of it.
But it makes the catching a hell of a lot more fun.
Xander Cage. Holy shit!
Live and in concert, one night only. This is crazy!
translation.ko: 딱 하룻밤만 하는 콘서트 보러 온 기분이네요

translation.en: I was at Coachella and Guns N' Roses got back together,
translation.ko: 건즈 앤 로지즈 재결합 공연도 갔었는데

translation.en: but this is way cooler.
translation.ko: 건즈 앤 로지즈 재결합 공연도 갔었는데 이게 더 끝내줘요

translation.en: Well, I wasn't actually there but I, like, heard about it, you know?
translation.ko: 사실 가서 보지는 않았고 끝내줬다고 들었거든요

translation.en: I'm still talking. Oh, my God. I'm sorry, it's like a bad habit.
translation.ko: 나 왜 이렇게 떠벌리니? 죄송해요, 말문이 한번 터지면

translation.en: I get started and then I can't stop and then I can't...
translation.ko: 죄송해요, 말문이 한번 터지면 - 멈추지를 못해요 - 심호흡해

translation.en: Breathe.
Take your time. I know mouth-to-mouth if necessary.
translation.ko: 천천히 쉬어 못 하겠으면 인공호흡 해주지

translation.en: Wow! Are you kidding me with those guns? You're like the frickin' Terminator!
translation.ko: 우와, 저 근육 좀 봐 터미네이터 저리 가라네요

translation.en: And I'm not talking about the first Terminator,
but the second Terminator that goes back to kill the first Terminator.
It was the liquidy metal guy.
Agent Clearidge worked closely with Gibbons.
translation.ko: 이쪽은 베키 기븐스와 일했고 임무를 지원할 거야

translation.en: She'll handle support for the operation.
And I bet a guy like you needs a lot of support.
translation.ko: 당신 같은 사람은 많은 지원이 필요하겠죠

translation.en: What are you? Like 220? 230?
Be honest. 250 is the hard max for my swing.
-Oh, come on. -[laughs] I'm kidding.
It's not like I have a safe word, or anything. It's "kumquat."
Never really think about it. [whispers] Kumquat.
translation.ko: 그 생각은 안 하고 살지만요 금귤

translation.en: -What about you? -[chuckles]
No. "Safe" isn't in my vocabulary.
Touché. You are Xander Cage. [chuckles]
Anything you need, Becky can source it within the hour.
translation.ko: 필요한 건 베키가 1시간 내에 구해줄 거야

translation.en: Except for any sort of illegal drugs.
Those, I'll have within 15 minutes.
Kidding.
But if you need a fifty of Purple Urkle, I am not the girl to ask.
translation.ko: 대마초 당겨도 절대 내게 부탁하지 마요

translation.en: [Marke] Okay, Cage, follow me. I'll introduce you to your ground team.
-Thank you, Becky. -Of course.
Kumquat.
Hey, here comes the Red Bull freak show.
[Marke] Xander Cage, I want you to meet Paul...
[Xander] Donovan.
Captain Paul Donovan.
I know you. I saw you on TV!
The President gave him a medal. That must have been pretty cool, right?
You guys must have some seriously cool stories to tell.
Must've seen a lot. I wonder...
How many of you have ever pulled a freestyle triple backflip
translation.ko: 산악용 자전거 타고 뒤로 공중제비 세 바퀴를

translation.en: on a BMX bike before? All of you?
-No. We don't play on bikes. -[Xander] Oh, you don't play on bikes.
Any of you ever carve an R4 on a snowboard
while an avalanche is on your booty?
We're soldiers, hotshot. Not slackers.
[Xander] Okay, but you all have HALO jumped over Eastern Europe
using a standard-issue armor deployment parachute system. Am I right?
translation.ko: 군 보급품을 낙하산에 매달고 뛰어내려 봤겠지? 아니

translation.en: No. We're not all jacked up on Mountain Dew and Red Bull, you asshole.
translation.ko: 아니 우린 당신처럼 그딴 것들에 환장 안 해

translation.en: -[men laugh] -Where'd you find this guy?
-[scoffs] -Well there's a first time for everything.
What did you just do? I can't believe this shit.
I'm not gonna have clowns watch my back.
I know I'm gonna regret asking you this, but who would you trust?
translation.ko: 물어본 걸 후회하겠지만 그럼 누구면 믿겠는데?

translation.en: You know, no one has this number.
So, what are you up to these days?
-Me? -[lion roars] -I'm evening the odds. -[man screams]
-[Officer 1] Move in, move in! -[Officer 2] Show me your hands!
[Officer 1] Get on the car, now! Behind your back!
translation.ko: - 차에 엎드려, 당장! - 손 뒤로 해!

translation.en: It was like that when I got here.
Nobody gets in unless you're an X-Game participant! You hear me?
translation.ko: X게임 참가자 외엔 못 들어가 알아들어?

translation.en: That guy got through. Hey, get back here!
translation.ko: - 저놈이 몰래 들어갔어 - 이리 안 와!

translation.en: Wassup, Nyjah?
Lightningbolt and Burrito.
Chad, wassup, bro?
Roberta. I'll see you later.
Show him the love! Give it up for The Hood!
The good, the bad, the extreme,
translation.ko: 착한 놈, 나쁜 놈, 극단적인 놈

translation.en: and the completely insane.
Now, this is a team I can work with.
[Marke] I'll make this easy for you.
These four assholes, very bad guys.
Pandora's Box, very bad thing. We'll land in Manila
translation.ko: 판도라의 상자는 나쁜 물건이야 마닐라 도착하면 알아서 그 섬으로 가

translation.en: and you will requisition your own transportation to the island.
translation.ko: 마닐라 도착하면 알아서 그 섬으로 가

translation.en: Yo, why don't we just nuke this bitch from orbit and call it a day?
Pandora's Box is one of a kind.
-It needs to be recovered intact. -[Tennyson] Why? What's it do?
translation.ko: 반드시 회수해야 해 왜? 무슨 상자인데?

translation.en: -Brainwave scrambler? -It killed Gibbons.
All you need to know. The rest is classified.
-Brainwave scrambler. -[sniffing] You smell that?
Smells like the same shit in a different suit.
You think a dog knows how to work a Frisbee?
translation.ko: 개가 원반 던질 줄 알 것 같아?

translation.en: Master says, "Fetch," and the bitch listens.
You would look so sexy with a Frisbee in that mouth.
[Marke] Oh, sweetheart, this is not a game.
You are all my soldiers now.
[scoffs] I'm not a soldier, I'm a baller.
translation.ko: - 난 군인이 아니라 괴물 신인인데 - 우리가 군인 같아 보여?

translation.en: -Do we look like soldiers? -Oh, hell, no.
translation.ko: - 난 군인이 아니라 괴물 신인인데 - 우리가 군인 같아 보여? 절대 아니죠

translation.en: I dropped your soldiers over Eastern Europe. So, why did you leave Lassie behind?
translation.ko: - 군인들은 아까 버렸잖아 - 그 여자도 버리지

translation.en: This is my operation! You will listen to me.
translation.ko: 작전 책임자는 나야 내 지시에 따라

translation.en: [Adele] Meeting's over.
Well, other than that, Mrs. Lincoln, how was the play?
Oh, hey, that's super-cinch body armor.
You've got to tighten the strap...
...over here. I got this one.
-What are you, my handler? -[chuckles]
I'm whatever you need. I can handle anything.
And I've got a tight grip. And just so you know, I am not a field agent.
translation.ko: 내가 좀 빡빡한 사람이거든요 참고로 난 현장 요원이 아니라서

translation.en: I do not go out in the field. Ever.
Now, that's where all the fun is.
[chuckles nervously] Yeah, fun scares me.
People scare me. Guns scare me. People with guns really scare me.
translation.ko: 사람 무섭고, 총도 무섭고 총 가진 사람은 더 무섭고

translation.en: And if I'm scared, I can't do my job. And if I can't do my job, then people die.
translation.ko: 내가 겁에 질려 일을 못 하면 사람 목숨이 날아가요

translation.en: And if people die, then who am I tech-supporting? Literally no one.
translation.ko: 그럼 제가 기술 지원 해줄 사람이 남겠어요? 하나도 없겠죠

translation.en: But I will make sure to keep you safe.
It ain't easy to keep me safe.
Yeah, these bad boys are my favorite, too.
They're called exo-gloves. DARPA's new ground combat initiative.
translation.ko: '엑소 글러브'란 건데 방위고등연구계획국의 새 지상 전투 장비죠

translation.en: Pneumatic pistons drive the gears, quadruple the speed
translation.ko: 압축 피스톤으로 펀치의 스피드와 강도를 4배 높여줘요

translation.en: and power of your punches.
Uh, uh-uh-uh... Nope, nope.
This is a multistage signal disruptor.
It's very, very breakable.
Can you tell me the real reason behind the crash
of Pan Am Flight 103 over Lockerbie?
-Yes. -Ah. You're one of them, aren't you?
-[electronic whirring] -Hey, easy there, Rocky.
I wasn't kidding when I said there's enough force in these bad boys
to probably punch a hole through the fricking plane.
Keep screwing around. What could possibly go wrong?
That is my style, though. Yeah, good. Glad to hear it.
Oh, you know, actually,
I would rather if you didn't...
That's refreshing. You actually know what you're doing down there.
Yeah. That's what she said.
[man speaking Tagalog] Let them pass!
You need something, man?
Well, I heard this is a perfect place to disappear for a few days
for my crew, no questions asked.
Hey, Mi casa es su casa, if the price is right.
translation.ko: 액수만 맞으면 내 집이 네 집이지

translation.en: Perfect. Tennyson!
I think you're gonna like this.
I just happen to have the best hardware in the South Pacific.
translation.ko: 남태평양에선 이런 물건 구경도 못 해

translation.en: 30% off the top gets you our finest hospitality package.
30% off the top? Do I get the girls for a weekend and two coconuts?
[speaks Spanish] 10%?
You must've been aiming at the other lawless, uncharted island down the block.
translation.ko: 지도에 없는 다른 무법 지대 섬 찾아봐

translation.en: Happens all the time. Here's what you do.
translation.ko: 이런 놈들 많다니까 그대로 돌아서서 배 타고 잽싸게 꺼져

translation.en: You turn around, go get your boat. You can kiss my ass.
translation.ko: 그대로 돌아서서 배 타고 잽싸게 꺼져

translation.en: Okay, hang on.
What do you think?
You talked me into it!
You think this is a flea market?
You think we're in the hood selling TVs and fake watches, or something like that?
translation.ko: 훔친 TV나 짝퉁 시계 파는 뒷골목 같아?

translation.en: What's wrong with you, man? [speaks Spanish]
All right.
-Twenty-two and a half. -How you gonna do "and a half"?
Twenty-two
and a half.
All right, man. Enjoy this party.
I like your style, man.
Stay on that boat, no matter what. Adele, Nicks!
All right, guys, keep your earbuds in.
Like always, Adele, you're my eyes in the sky.
translation.ko: 늘 그렇듯이 아델이 위에서 잘 감시해 주고

translation.en: Nicks, you're gonna show 'em how we do it.
translation.ko: 닉스, 얘들한테 노는 법 좀 보여줘

translation.en: You got this?
Just watch. [chuckles]
Can you keep this behind the bar for me?
-[Bartender] What can I get you? -A cranberry and club soda.
[whispers] Let's make that two.
-Thank you. -You're welcome.
Stay focused.
Really? [sniffs]
Xander Cage. Back in action.
Did I ever leave?
Shit.
Spotted our clown.
Easier than expected. Drinks all around.
That's him.
What do you know? It's douchebag hunting season.
My favorite.
It's a little early in the evening to slay someone.
-Let me fix it. -[Adele] Oh, Come on.
If Dance Dance Revolution doesn't deserve a bullet, I don't know who does.
translation.ko: 저런 댄싱머신한테는 총알 하나 정도 박아줘야 해

translation.en: [Nicks] Is this a party or a funeral?
[woman] It's a party!
Either way, somebody's getting turned up tonight!
translation.ko: 어쨌든 누구 하나 죽을 때까지 달려봐!

translation.en: I told you he was fun to have around.
At first, I thought Special Forces.
But your ink's all wrong.
CIA?
They would send in a drone, bomb us to hell.
MI6?
You're not the kind of subtle they prefer.
You know, the men who come to this island, they're on the run.
Hiding from the world.
But not you.
You're not here to hide.
You're looking for someone.
And who's to say I haven't already found her?
Was that meant to scare me?
A little tremble would be nice.
Well,
considering you're one tremble away from limping out of here...
...I'd say I'm close enough.
Does this mean you're not making me breakfast in the morning?
I'd say you're a couple inches off.
translation.ko: 그쪽 조준이 살짝 빗나간 것 같은데

translation.en: Bit of a stalemate.
-Not if you drop the gun. -I'm not the bad guy.
translation.ko: 먼저 총 버려 난 나쁜 놈 아냐

translation.en: I don't believe in good guys.
[Xiang] Serena?
[speaking Mandarin] Who's your friend?
We just met.
But we were getting along famously until somebody
decided to interrupt.
Stick to the path.
Here, honey.
[Xiang] There's a lot of unmarked graves on the island.
translation.ko: 이 섬엔 주인 모를 무덤이 많거든

translation.en: I'll bet whoever sold you that shirt is in one of them.
And how long do you intend to push your luck?
Until I get what I came for.
Which is what exactly?
[speaking Mandarin] A damn, strong drink.
So, let's be real and talk about what we all really want.
translation.ko: 까놓고 얘기해 보자 각자 진짜 목적이 뭔데?

translation.en: I'm only here for that.
And in my mind, you guys could walk away nicely. Unless you want to continue our foreplay.
translation.ko: 좋게 말할 때 떠나 계속 밀당하고 싶다면 모를까

translation.en: Power like that doesn't belong in anyone's hands.
Just improvising.
[Adele] Mate, seriously? A grenade? What is this? Eastern Europe in the early '90s?
-Next, he's gonna send you a fax. -[snickers]
So, you're willing to kill...
just to keep that for yourself?
That's the wrong question to ask.
What's the right question?
"Are you willing to die for it?"
One grenade, three people.
I like the odds.
Two grenades, three people.
I'm loving these odds.
You ever bleed so much, when you open your eyes, all you see is red?
translation.ko: 피를 많이 흘리면 모든 게 빨갛게 보이지

translation.en: When you have fought war on every continent...
[Adele] Come on, X, just say the word. Let me put both these assholes out to pasture.
translation.ko: 엑스, 말만 해요 둘 다 골로 보내버리죠

translation.en: ...you expect death.
-Our bodies are such fragile things. -Come on. Let me shoot him.
Death sometimes just...
sneaks up on you.
[Adele] It's been a while since I played hot potato.
[Xiang] I'm in this hospital bed. I'm barely conscious. Delirious.
translation.ko: 병원 침대에 누워 피를 철철 흘리면서 사경을 헤맬 때

translation.en: Drowning in my own blood.
translation.ko: 피를 철철 흘리면서 사경을 헤맬 때

translation.en: And all I can hear myself think is, "Today's the day.
Today's the day you die."
I'm touched.
-Can I have my jacket, when you get a sec? -Okay.
Then a man comes along, tells me a story
about a drought in California.
About skateboards and swimming pools.
About a man named Xander Cage.
Oh, shit. He's Triple-X.
I heard he was dead.
Is he?
We are all Triple-X.
We just have different agendas.
She wants to destroy it.
I'm gonna use it.
And I'll be damned if I'm gonna let you take it back to the NSA.
Now, it's a party.
Everybody, get down! Move! Move!
Shit's about to go down.
You ready to have some fun?
[speaking Russian] Turn the music off!
Stop it!
Everybody, hands up! Now!
On the floor!
First person to move, first person to die!
I moved.
[chuckles] I just moved again. I'm still alive.
translation.ko: 나 또 움직였거든? 근데 아직 살아있네

translation.en: [soldier] Shut up, "hero"!
All right.
Let's do this.
Don't move!
Okay, I actually have what you want.
Pandora's Box?
I got it right here.
But you're wrong, though.
You take it from me, and you die first.
Then Lieutenant Leningrad, who thinks he's got your back.
translation.ko: 그다음은 네 뒤에 있는 레닌그라드 중위

translation.en: Then the two Ivans by the door.
Moscow Mule by the bar.
And then Igor on the stairs.
See where we're going with this?
But none of that matters.
'Cause like I said,
if you take this from me, you die first.
I'll take it from you dead or alive.
And if you hold it too tight, I cut your arm off.
Suit yourself.
-[people screaming] -Leningrad.
Hi, Ivan. Other Ivan.
Ooh, bye-bye, Moscow Mule.
Igor. That's another one you owe me, X.
[over earpiece] Read between the lines.
Tennyson! Some back-up would be nice.
-Huh? -Some back-up would be nice! Come on, man!
X said stay on the boat.
That was before the goddamn Russian invasion touched down, man!
X said stay on the boat.
You want to play?
That doesn't belong in anyone's hands.
You want it, come and get it.
Was that necessary?
It's what Gibbons would have wanted.
[Adele] X!
X.
It happened again. Another satellite fell.
Us working as a team.
That's what Gibbons would've wanted.
You in?
[newscaster] An explosion inside the Olympic Stadium rocks Moscow.
translation.ko: 모스크바 올림픽 경기장 폭발 사고로 "위성이 러시아 경기장에 떨어져"

translation.en: Seven workers are now confirmed dead, with at least 25 others injured
in this senseless act of violence.
A source inside the Pentagon says a rogue satellite
translation.ko: 펜타곤 관계자에 따르면 탈취된 위성이 무기로 사용됐다고 합니다

translation.en: may have been used as a weapon. This was the rumor...
translation.ko: 탈취된 위성이 무기로 사용됐다고 합니다 이는…

translation.en: Guess this means Pandora's Box isn't exactly classified.
[newscaster] In a new video released just moments ago, an anonymous group
is claiming to have the ability to use satellites as weapons.
translation.ko: 자신들은 위성을 무기로 쓸 능력이 있으며

translation.en: They claim "that the violation of civil liberties
of all the citizens of the world is an atrocity that must be stopped."
translation.ko: 세계 시민들의 자유를 억압하는 행위를 즉각 중단하라고 요구했습니다

translation.en: [distorted voice] Disable and dismantle all the world's spy programs within the next 24 hours,
or I'll do it for you, one satellite at a time.
There are 30,000 satellites orbiting the Earth at this moment.
I will drop one satellite every 24 hours until my demands are met.
Eyewitnesses in Moscow...
-Was this always part of your mission too? -Of course not.
We were a new Triple-X team Gibbons created.
We discovered a high-level intelligence officer was trying to manipulate satellites.
And even before we could unmask him, Gibbons was killed.
[Xander] So, you knew they were Triple-X all along.
translation.ko: 다 트리플 엑스인 걸 알고 있었군?

translation.en: I needed you to retain a sense of objectivity.
I don't understand. If I destroyed Pandora's Box, what happened in Moscow?
translation.ko: 판도라의 상자는 파괴됐는데 어떻게 된 거지?

translation.en: If I'm right, which I am,
this box only ever had the ability to control one satellite.
What does that mean?
It means we've been chasing a prototype.
[Tennyson] And these guys have the real one? Yeah.
Serena played us for fools.
Betrayed us.
[Xiang] This isn't about Serena. This is war.
And either we stop it today, or we watch the world burn tomorrow.
translation.ko: 오늘 막지 못하면 내일 세상은 잿더미가 돼

translation.en: -Can't lose focus on that. -Yeah.
Where you been? You stop off for the old rub-and-tug?
-Your mom says hi. -[laughs]
Tracker on board? Nobody saw you?
translation.ko: 왔군, 추적기 실었어? 본 사람은 없고?

translation.en: -Nobody ever sees me, boss. -Good.
[Xander] Now, these suits control every spy satellite in the sky.
translation.ko: 이 꼰대들이 감시 인공위성을 전부 통제해

translation.en: But how often do these seven men all sit in the same room together?
[Marke] Almost never.
[Xander] And if you needed retinal scans,
cell phone data dumps, biometrics of all the superpowers in the world,
translation.ko: 망막 스캔, 핸드폰 기록 생체 정보가 필요하면

translation.en: -who would you target? -Oh, shit.
[Xander] Who has that kind of power to actually set that in motion?
translation.ko: 누가 그런 정보를 수집할 힘을 가졌지?

translation.en: Oh, you're pissing up the wrong tree, Cage. I came looking for you, remember?
translation.ko: 헛짚었어, 케이지 당신을 찾아간 건 나였어

translation.en: Oh, asshole... We gonna have problems?
Oh, no problem. How was your trip?
-[chuckles] -I'm just doing the math.
Oh, yeah? What math?
Air velocity divided by distance.
So, when I stuff you down the toilet,
Search and rescue will know where to find you between China and North Korea.
translation.ko: 중국과 북한 사이 어디서 널 구해야 할지 알 테니까

translation.en: Keep talking shit, little man.
Yeah, hold that thought, G.I. Joe.
Roll it back.
A little more. More.
-A little more. Stop. -[glass shattering]
Okay, when Xiang broke the window,
he's the only one that didn't flinch.
I need the President on the phone...
That's not gonna come off, you know that, right?
I'll have to replace the goddamn screen.
I've been saying the Director of the CIA has been trying to destroy the world for years.
translation.ko: 전부터 말했지? CIA 국장이 세상을 조질 거라고

translation.en: Okay, we have carte blanche to track this son of a bitch down.
Do any of you know how to do it?
The same way Xiang and I found Pandora's Box in New York.
translation.ko: 시앙과 내가 뉴욕에서 판도라의 상자를 찾은 방식?

translation.en: Pandora's Box needs to keep reconnecting itself because the satellites orbit.
translation.ko: 위성 궤도 때문에 계속 재접속해야 해요

translation.en: -Excuse me. -Uh...
All we need to do is track down the main signal,
and then we can approximate its location within a 20-mile radius.
[Adele] Of all the places in the world to lay low,
this fruit loop chooses Detroit?
[male reporter] These blasts did take place in Moscow, but they were felt around the world.
translation.ko: 전 세계를 충격에 빠뜨린 모스크바 사태의

translation.en: Good morning. As feared, the death toll in the Moscow tragedy is rising.
-In addition to the latest deaths... -Let me guess.
translation.ko: 최신 사망자 수에… 다들 첩보 조직을 없애려고 난리겠죠?

translation.en: Everyone's jumping at the chance to dismantle their spy programs.
No.
The world's too stupid to realize that Moscow wasn't a bluff.
translation.ko: 멍청한 것들, 모스크바 일이 허풍이 아니었단 걸 모르고 있어

translation.en: [Marke] Okay, Triple-X, you will base out of an NSA safe house.
translation.ko: 트리플 엑스 NSA 안가를 본부로 써

translation.en: Becky will coordinate earbud communications and have the signal disruptor on standby.
translation.ko: 베키가 통신과 신호 교란기를 담당할 거야

translation.en: Nicks, when I crashed the boat up on shore and saved your life...
translation.ko: 닉스, 내가 널 구하려고 배를 작살냈잖아

translation.en: Yeah, whatever, bro.
...do you think that counts as crash 199 for me? You know, officially?
Officially, you're deranged.
Cool.
[Marke] We'll set up a triangulated signal tracking system around the city.
translation.ko: 도시에 삼각 측량 신호 추적 시스템 구축하고

translation.en: And when Becky locks in his exact location, we make our move.
translation.ko: 베키가 놈의 정확한 위치를 알아내는 즉시 움직이는 거야

translation.en: [Xander] What about you? How did you get roped into all this?
[Serena] I tagged a skyscraper and got a year in jail for it.
Jail?
-Seems excessive. -Mm-hmm.
The tag was 30 stories tall.
Two million hits on YouTube.
And I served only half the sentence.
Let me guess. Gibbons to the rescue.
Yup. He said a lion like me doesn't belong in any kind of cage.
translation.ko: 나 같은 사자는 우리에 갇혀선 안 된대

translation.en: I got mine after I left the NSA.
-What about that one on your wrist? -[Serena] London.
2009. I climbed the Millennium Wheel.
-Naked. -Naked?
-Yeah. -High school.
Oh, no!
-We all have our embarrassing moments. -No!
What about that sexy one?
This? Phoenix out of the ashes.
Eighteen hours in a chair in Mexico.
I drank my bodyweight in tequila to get through it.
It's the most important one, actually. It's...
It's when I decided to change the world instead of...
rage against it.
[Becky] We found him. We found Pandora's Box.
Xander, do you copy?
[Xander] We're here. Okay, send Tennyson.
Uh, looks like East 404 Congress Street. He's on the top floor.
I'm showing activity in Pandora's Box.
translation.ko: 판도라의 상자가 활성화됐어요 신호 교란이 가능하긴 한데

translation.en: I can jam the signal, but only for a few minutes, so hurry.
translation.ko: 판도라의 상자가 활성화됐어요 신호 교란이 가능하긴 한데 길어봐야 몇 분이니까 서둘러요

translation.en: [Becky] You've got to get there fast and take this guy down.
Not if we find him first.
Whoa! Red light! Red light! Red light!
Did you know traffic signals were invented by Big Oil to waste fuel and drive up profits?
translation.ko: 신호등은 석유 회사가 만든 거야 자꾸 멈춰야 기름이 닳으니까

translation.en: If I say yes, will you please just slow down? Look out!
translation.ko: 알았다고 하면 속도 줄일 거예요? 조심해요!

translation.en: Wait. Is this the part where you act the basic bitch
translation.ko: 잠깐만 지금 나를 못 믿겠으니 지켜볼 거라고 재수 없게 굴 거지?

translation.en: and tell me you got your eye on me and that you don't trust me?
translation.ko: 지금 나를 못 믿겠으니 지켜볼 거라고 재수 없게 굴 거지?

translation.en: -Welcome to the moment. -[Nicks] Whoa, whoa, whoa
Everyone needs backup.
[Nicks] Stop, stop, stop, stop! Stop, stop, stop, stop!
Tennyson?
[Xander] Gridlocked.
There it is.
If you run into trouble,
dial nine.
It's an old Gibbons fail-safe.
You crashed my party! Stole my dance partner.
translation.ko: 내 파티를 망쳤잖아 내 파트너도 뺏었고

translation.en: I'm gonna crash yours. Have fun.
translation.ko: 이제 내 차례야 재미 좀 봐

translation.en: This ain't a party. This is a race.
Hey!
-What the hell you think you're doing? -Building a ramp.
Go, go, go!
Go, go, go, go!
-Hey! Out of the car! Get out! -Hey, what are you doing?
translation.ko: 거기, 차에서 내려, 내리라고! - 뭐 하는 거예요? 놔요! - 빨리!

translation.en: -Let's go! -[man yelling]
translation.ko: - 뭐 하는 거예요? 놔요! - 빨리! 안 돼!

translation.en: [Becky] Shit. He's trying to reconnect it.
Guys, I can only jam the signal for so long before he chooses another satellite.
translation.ko: 오래는 못 막아요 다른 위성을 선택할 거예요

translation.en: You have to hurry.
-I have a plan. -[gasps]
-Hold on! -"Hold on" ain't no goddamn plan!
translation.ko: 꽉 잡아 꽉 잡는 게 무슨 좋은 수예요!

translation.en: [gasps] No, no, no, no!
-[gun cocks] -Hi.
You looking for someone?
That's 200!
[chuckles] Come on.
No, no, no... Xander, you got to get to the top floor.
translation.ko: 큰일 났다 젠더, 얼른 꼭대기로 올라가요

translation.en: He's trying to engage another satellite. Hurry.
Fish in a barrel.
Forty-five U.S.P.
Twelve round mag.
Five left.
-[gunshots] -Three.
What the hell's going on out there?
Empty.
[Becky] Adele, Xander's in. Find the target, light him up.
translation.ko: 아델, 젠더가 들어갔어요 목표 찾아서 쏴요

translation.en: [Xiang] Gibbons thought you'd be back.
To be the hero we needed.
You take the box to the NSA,
and we're right back to where we started.
-[gun cocks] -Wow.
This is touching.
Gibbons would be proud to see you two working together.
I'm walking out of here, Xander.
You want to know a secret?
You forgot to put deodorant on?
I killed Gibbons because he was a self-righteous prick.
translation.ko: 기븐스는 내가 죽였어 정의의 사도처럼 까불더라고

translation.en: [Becky] Do you have a shot?
[CIA Director] He thought he had the right to police the world.
translation.ko: 세계의 자경단이 될 권리라도 있는 줄 알더군 아델, 목표 보여요?

translation.en: [Becky] Adele, do you have eyes on the target?
[grunts] I'm switching to thermal.
I was never going to stop downing satellites
no matter what happened. You know why?
translation.ko: 일이 어떻게 되든 말이야 왜인지 알아? 세상이 참 거지 같거든

translation.en: Because this world has turned...
translation.ko: 왜인지 알아? 세상이 참 거지 같거든

translation.en: [Becky] Please, please, please tell me you have a shot.
Damn it.
He's turned the heat up. I can't see shit.
[Adele] X, can't see you guys. Thermal's no good.
-Come on. Right? -[Adele] I've lost you in the heat.
You don't see what's going on in this world?
-So, what are you gonna do about it? -Easy.
X, keep Chatty Cathy talking. I still don't have a shot.
translation.ko: 엑스, 계속 말 시켜요 아직 안 보여요

translation.en: We made it that way. People like Gibbons and the two of you. And me.
translation.ko: 너희랑 기븐스 나 같은 놈들 잘못이지

translation.en: We made it that way. I mean, come on.
What's the point of getting up in the morning if you're not gonna reboot the world, right?
translation.ko: 세상을 다시 시작할 수 없다면 사는 게 의미가 있겠어?

translation.en: -[Xander] Okay. Easy. -[CIA Director] There's a war out there.
translation.ko: 알았으니 진정해 우린 생존을 위해 전쟁 중이야, 몰라?

translation.en: We're at war for our survival, you don't see it?
translation.ko: 우린 생존을 위해 전쟁 중이야, 몰라?

translation.en: Millions of people have died for nothing... It's their right.
translation.ko: 수백만 명이 개죽음을 당했어 그게 그 사람들 권리잖아

translation.en: -Isn't that right? -Read between the lines.
-Come on. Isn't it right? -[Xander] I'm gonna be honest with you.
What's been bugging me this whole time
is you've got something stuck in between your teeth.
-What the hell are you talking about? -I'm serious.
[CIA Director] What the hell's wrong with you?
Right there.
Nice shot.
Was there ever a doubt?
Uh, yeah, I confess, I had my doubts.
That's for talking shit about my friend, Gibbons.
-[door opens] -Xiang! Get on your knees! On your knees!
Hands! Hands!
On your knees, now.
Just in time.
Watch out, Cage. Keep this up, people might mistake you for one of the good guys.
translation.ko: 조심해, 케이지 계속 이러면 곧 영웅 되겠어

translation.en: -[handcuffs tightening] -Copy that.
Hey, suit.
You got what you wanted.
We both know he's not the bad guy here.
translation.ko: 저 녀석, 악당 아닌 거 알잖아

translation.en: And who do we blame for Moscow?
Better a living terrorist than a dead company man.
translation.ko: 죽은 CIA 국장보단 산 테러범이 낫잖아

translation.en: You see what I'm saying?
-Let's go. -Back on the plane.
-I want wheels up in 20. -Right. Let's go, boys.
translation.ko: 비행기로 가자, 20분 후 이륙한다 모두 철수

translation.en: [Xander] We recovered Pandora's Box.
They're gonna send an extraction team to pick you guys up.
But they're taking Xiang.
Oh, and, Serena, if you don't hear from me, remember, dial nine.
translation.ko: 그리고, 세레나 나한테 연락 없으면 9번을 눌러

translation.en: X takes care of its own.
You gave it back to Marke, didn't you?
Nice place. Spacious. Expensive.
-[Donovan] Shut up. -[car door shuts]
Thank you, sir.
Yes, minimal casualties.
Triple-X performed beyond any reasonable measure of expectation.
translation.ko: 네, 사상자는 적습니다 트리플 엑스가 기대 이상으로 잘해주었죠

translation.en: Let me guess.
That was my invite to the Oval Office.
As of 10 minutes ago, the Triple-X program was officially shuttered.
All active agents are to be erased from record and considered enemies of the state.
translation.ko: 요원들 기록은 삭제되고 국가의 적이 되는 거지

translation.en: It's just never a good idea to point a gun at me.
translation.ko: 나한테 총을 겨누고 무사한 사람은 없어

translation.en: [Nicks] Hey, are NSA extraction teams normally armed like they're invading Fallujah?
No, generally not. Watch the boys.
[Adele] Shit.
Oh, God! It's happening, isn't it? They're gonna start shooting at us, aren't they?
translation.ko: 맙소사, 구출이 아니라 우릴 죽이러 온 거죠?

translation.en: -Let's go! -Come on!
Clear out, let's go!
It's showtime.
[Serena] I guess we're on the same team now.
-[Talon] Give me one. -Hey.
You know me. Wind me up, point me in the right direction.
translation.ko: 내 성격 알지? 찍어 주면 다 쓸어버리겠어

translation.en: [Adele] Come on, let's go! Come on!
[Becky] This shit is getting real, isn't it? Is this what happens when shit gets real?
translation.ko: 진짜 벌어지는 거죠? 원래 이런 식이에요?

translation.en: -What do we do? -Just be where the bullets aren't.
translation.ko: 이제 어떡해요? 총알 잘 피해 다녀

translation.en: Sadly, the terrorist activated Pandora's Box
one last time before we could stop him.
You and your entire team were lost in the blast along with the device itself.
translation.ko: 너와 동료들은 다 죽었고 판도라의 상자도 파괴된 거야

translation.en: If the world thinks Pandora's Box is gone,
then they won't know we're using it to spy on them.
translation.ko: 첩보에 그 상자를 써도 아무도 모르겠지

translation.en: You're just another tyrant.
No. Patriot.
-Let me educate you on the difference. -[gunshots]
-Xander! -[groans]
Xander!
They say it's the last great adventure, Cage. Be sure and send a postcard.
translation.ko: 죽음은 마지막 모험이라던데 꼭 엽서 보내, 케이지

translation.en: -Engines hot! -All right. Let's go!
Xander!
Xander Cage!
-[Nicks] Go, go! -[Adele] Everybody, fan out!
[Tennyson] Find cover! Move!
[Nicks] Get behind there!
-There, take cover! Okay, okay. -[Nicks] Get behind there!
What a rush.
Damn, Becky, that's some body armor.
Hey. I told you you got no manners.
Did your mother ever teach you how to zip up your pants?
translation.ko: 엄마가 바지 지퍼 잘 올리고 다니라고 안 하던?

translation.en: Well?
[Xander] Serena.
-We're a bit busy now! -Marke's got Pandora's Box.
translation.ko: 지금 좀 바빠! 마크가 상자를 가져갔어 거기 위성을 떨어뜨릴 거야

translation.en: She's gonna drop a satellite on top of you.
translation.ko: 마크가 상자를 가져갔어 거기 위성을 떨어뜨릴 거야

translation.en: She's gonna drop a satellite on us!
Not if I jam the signal!
I need a power source!
-Go! -[stammers] Over there? By myself?
Go!
Cover me!
-[Adele] Fan out! -Go, go!
Hurry up, over there!
I go low.
I'll go high.
See if I can't find G.I. Joe.
Are you getting this interference?
Shit.
[man] Take 'em out, now!
-Everyone needs backup, right? -Yeah, I guess.
Let's do this.
Nicks!
-I've got a plan! -No!
-[grunting] -No, no, no!
Listen! From now on, I make the plans, you execute!
translation.ko: 들어요! 앞으로 계획은 내 몫이니 그냥 따르기나 하세요!

translation.en: Oh, shit. [laughs]
Oh, my God, this is fucking awesome!
What's wrong, hotshot? No witty comeback?
I just finally figured out that math problem.
It's gonna take two flushes.
Go, go, go!
Oh, shit. Way too many. Let's get out of here.
Get back! Come on!
Oh, shit!
[Becky] Oh, my, God, I'm gonna die.
[NSA Agent] Move! Push forward!
[Adele] This is all we've got.
[NSA Agent] Pin 'em! Pin 'em down!
Damn! I'm out of bullets. You got any?
No. Nothing.
I'm empty.
-We go on three. -Okay.
Wassup?
Rock, paper, scissor, grenade launcher.
translation.ko: 가위, 바위, 보! 유탄 발사기가 이겼네

translation.en: Darius Stone.
Triple-X since 2005.
Thanks for the assist.
X takes care of its own.
[sighs] You got to be kidding.
We failed.
[Serena] Xander, Marke activated the satellite and it's headed right for us.
I'm gonna have to take it out kamikaze style.
Don't do it. It's suicide. Nobody could survive that fall.
translation.ko: 안 돼, 자살 행위야 거기서 떨어지면 못 살아남아

translation.en: Oh, and tell Nicks to have that camera ready.
Low-orbit freefall, no chute and big fireworks.
translation.ko: 낙하산 없는 저궤도 자유 낙하에 불꽃놀이까지 벌어질 테니

translation.en: They say it's the last great adventure.
Be sure to send a postcard.
I live for this shit.
Shit.
[Xander] Nicks, I hope you got that on camera!
If it ain't on video, it didn't happen!
Oh, yeah. Hall of Fame shit right here, bro.
You know I could've done that, right?
translation.ko: - 나도 할 수 있었어 - 웃기지 마

translation.en: -Bullshit. -Shut up.
What happened to Marke?
The ground broke her fall.
Still don't believe in good guys?
It's okay if you're a little bad.
How bad?
Now, that right there,
that was a hell of an entrance.
That's a hell of a car.
Yeah. Gibbons told me to keep an eye on it.
He said I'd know why when I need to know why.
Now I know why.
It's exactly the way I left it.
I took it on a date or two.
[Xander] X takes care of its own.
That's why I figured you'd come through.
To get a chance to work with the legendary Xander Cage?
Where do I sign up?
Now you know, you done pissed on the wrong damn picnic.
The whole world gonna be looking for us.
I wouldn't have it any other way.
[soloist] We thought we'd end with Augustus' favorite song.
-Wow, that's an impressive trick. -What?
Think you're the only one who knows how to play dead?
translation.ko: 자네만 시체 놀이 하란 법 있어?

translation.en: Gotcha.
This is some pretty surreal shit, being at your own funeral.
I love that song.
And it could be a wonderful world,
if we just stopped doing bad shit to it.
If you wanted me out of retirement, you could've just asked me.
You always responded to less subtle motivation.
Now what?
You keep being the rebel the world doesn't know it needs.
Watch the watchers. Fight the enemy within.
Damn, that's so complicated.
Really?
Let me simplify it for you.
Kick some ass.
Get the girl.
And try to look dope while you're doing it.
You can do "dope," can't you?
Sure you can.
-[Gibbons] Junior, let's bounce! -I'll see you later, X.
I can definitely make that work.
Let's do this.
You got me.
[chuckles] Gotcha.
I'm not a soldier, I'm a baller.
I'll see you later, X.
Sure you can.
-Bye-bye. -[gunshot]
